text: Fantastic pizza and a whole list of other dishes makes this the best family friendly restaurant around!  Awesome friendly employees just make dinner so much better!  Thank you Pizza Place!

text: Best pizza I've ever had. Screw the big chains. I consider myself a pizza connoisseur and let me tell you. If you enjoy the selection at Cicis, and love the papa John's peppers and garlic butter dip, then this is the place for you. Great prices and great food. I'm a customer for life.

text: Great pizza, always has been my favorite pizza place to go (pun not intended) lol. Nice staff and good prices. Only complaint if any being no delivery, but with their size it can't really be helped. Regardless still my favorite place to get pizza.

name: Jay Timberlake
text: I just ate there and I thought the buffalo chicken thin crust was very tasty. Perfectly done, no burning on the bottom which places do a lot. Friendly staff, the girl that took my order was exceptionally sweet and friendly to chat with. She recommended the Buffalo pizza and I am glad she did. Thank you!
